Name: Draw the Road
About the game: Each of us wants to do what he wants. Why don't you start right now? Draw the Road is a casual-racing game which lets you create your own scenario. Your mission is to drive the car as far as possible to break new records. The big problem is that you run out of gas very quickly, for this reason you have to refuel the car regularly so it doesn't stay on the road. That's why we offer you the chance to create your route in such a way that you think you can topple mountains. Let your imagination go! Game Features : - Draw your own route - Gasoline leak - Beating new records
